CustomField.formula: IF(DATEVALUE(valid_from__c) <= ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-12), Orders_last_year_rolling__c, IF((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(valid_from__c))<=0,(TODAY() - ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-12))*Orders_last_year_rolling__c,(TODAY() - ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),-12))/(TODAY() - DATEVALUE(valid_from__c))* Orders_last_year_rolling__c))
CustomField.label: Projected orders last year (rolling)
